# Can DuckDB replace your data stack?

2025/10/23

MotherDuck co-founder Ryan Boyd joins the Super Data Brothers show to talk about all things DuckDB, MotherDuck, AI agents/LLMs, hypertenancy and more.

- What makes DuckDB great and how MotherDuck fits into it?
- What makes DuckDB and MotherDuck different from engines like Snowflake?
- How people are using MotherDuck for analytics. It it just a data warehouse?
- How can DuckDB and MotherDuck work with AI agents?

We were supposed to talk about DuckLake but didn't get to it!

...SHOW MORE
